description:
Enterprises (with a turnover from EUR 250 000)

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
47415 Structural survey of service activities

Definition:
An enterprise is the smallest, legally independent entity
engaged in economic activity (a body for carrying out a
professional activity or an enterprise).
This statistical unit is both the survey unit and the unit
of presentation.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2016
name: Enterprises (with a turnover from EUR 250 000)
